name: Stargaze (itch) (DiogoAlexof)
description:
Stargaze is a multiplayer co-op game that requires two players. The player's can choose to play as the Engineer or as the Navigator, resulting in different experiences for both but also working towards the same goal, repairing your ship. As you couldn't join the rest of your crew when escaping, you are the only ones on the ship, so you need to work together for a chance to return home.

In order to play the game both players have to add this game to Steam's Library in order to connect to the server. Invite your friends to play through the friend's list or create a room!

---------------------------------INFO---------------------------------

YEAR

2022

GENRE

Puzzle, CO-OP

PLATFORM

PC

DEVELOPMENT TIME

2-3 MONTHS

Stargaze is an university project on which I worked as a Gameplay Programmer and VFX artist. The game was developed by 3 other people alongside me, Gonçalo Rodrigues  as Gameplay Programmer & Network Engineer, Susana Lima as the art Director and 3D artist, and Mariana Oliveira as the main Game Designer & Story Writer.

Download it here: https://susanaflm.itch.io/stargaze
